attributes.action: Ban the slaughter of animals with out pre stunning them first
attributes.additional_details: We are an animal loving Country, some of us eat meat, we who eat meat realize that our animals have to die,over many years we have tried to make that end as painless as possible, yet there are millions of animals being slaughtered in our Country with out pre stunning them first, it's time to put a stop to this practice and get back to our values we have for our animals...Installing CCTV cameras in the slaughter houses is not the answer...
